item.title: Lionel Messi Has An Epic Performance as Inter Miami Reaches MLS Cup East Final
item.description: Lionel Messi had a goal and three assists as Inter Miami beat FC Cincinnati 4-0 Sunday to advance to the Eastern Conference finals.
